question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Babur?
1. He introduced the concept of Char-Baghs and symmetrically laid out gardens with running waters and fountains.
2. He got constructed two mosques, one at Panipat and another at Sambhat in Rohilkhand.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Babur introduced the concept of Char-Baghs and symmetrically laid out gardens with running waters and fountains. He got constructed two mosques, one at Panipat and another at Sambhat in Rohilkhand.
